name: Monsieur Hire
tagline: A recluse is accused of murdering a young woman simply because his neighbors think he is strange.

name: Marley
tagline: A documentary on the life, music, and legacy of Bob Marley.

name: Salaam Namaste

production.name: Films & Casting Temple Pvt. Ltd. Sydney

tagline: Salaam Namaste is about two Indians who have left their houses to make a life on their own, and how they meet and how they tackle their own relationships and problems and overcome them themselves without their families.

name: The Notorious Bettie Page
tagline: The story of Bettie Page, uber-successful 1950's pin-up model, one of the first sex icons in America, and the target of a Senate investigation (based on her bondage photos).

name: Paheli
tagline: A folk tale - supernatural love story about a ghost who falls in love with a newlywed woman.

name: Where Angels Fear to Tread
tagline: After a rich Edwardian widow impulsively marries a handsome but poor Tuscan dentist and dies in childbirth, her English in-laws try to gain custody of the baby.

name: The Offspring
tagline: In a small Tennessee town, an historian relates four horror stories to a reporter.

name: French Twist
tagline: After learning of her husband's infidelities, a housewife invites an itinerant lesbian to move in with them. None of their lives will ever be the same again.

name: Arch of Triumph
tagline: Illegal refugees lead dark lives in pre-World War II Paris.

name: Ushpizin
tagline: An Orthodox Jewish couple's faith is tested after praying to the Lord for a child on the Succoth holiday.

name: Courage Mountain
tagline: In this version of "Heidi," a young Swiss girl is sent off to boarding school at the beginning of World War I.

name: Saving Private Perez
tagline: A Mexican crime lord is forced by his mother to plan a suicidal rescue mission to find his lost brother in the most unexpected place on Earth...

name: The Kid with a Bike
tagline: Abandoned by his father, a young boy is left in a state-run youth farm. In a random act of kindness, the town hairdresser agrees to foster him on weekends.

name: Girl Most Likely
tagline: A failed New York playwright awkwardly navigates the transition from Next Big Thing to Last Year's News.

name: Daddy's Dyin'... Who's Got the Will?
tagline: Bickering siblings are reunited at their Texas home as their father lies on his deathbed in this black comedy.

name: South Central
tagline: A man is sent to prison for 10 years. Coming out of prison he wants to live a normal life and stop crime but his son has now followed the criminal path of his father.

name: I'm So Excited!
tagline: When it appears as though the end is in sight, the pilots, flight crew, and passengers of a plane heading to Mexico City look to forget the anguish of the moment and face the greatest danger, which we carry within ourselves.

name: Race

production.name: Films & Casting Temple Pvt. Ltd. Sydney

tagline: Destiny makes two brothers- Ranvir and Rajiv - enemies of each other. Everything is fair in love and war.

name: Looking for Richard
tagline: Al Pacino's deeply-felt rumination on Shakespeare's significance and relevance to the modern world through interviews and an in-depth analysis of "Richard III."

name: Gimme Shelter
tagline: A pregnant teenager flees her abusive mother in search of her father, only to be rejected by her dad and forced to survive on the streets until a compassionate stranger offers a hopeful alternative.

name: Read My Lips
tagline: She is almost deaf and she lip-reads. He is an ex-convict. She wants to help him. He thinks no one can help except himself.

name: The Devil's Double
tagline: A chilling vision of the House of Saddam Hussein comes to life through the eyes of the man who was forced to become the double of Hussein's sadistic son.

name: The Secrets of Jonathan Sperry
tagline: An wise old Christian man imparts Biblical truths to three boys during the summer of 1970.

name: The Oscar Nominated Short Films: Animation
tagline: Collective screening of the Academy Award nominated short films from the Animation category for 2011.

name: Platoon Leader
tagline: A young officer, just out of West Point is sent to Vietnam, where the men don't respect him until he gets wounded and returns to be a wiser soldier and a better commander

name: Wadjda
tagline: An enterprising Saudi girl signs on for her school's Koran recitation competition as a way to raise the remaining funds she needs in order to buy the green bicycle that has captured her interest.

name: Snow Flower and the Secret Fan
tagline: A story set in nineteenth-century China and focusing on the life-long friendship between two girls who develop their own secret code as a way to contend with the rigid social norms imposed on women.

name: At Play in the Fields of the Lord
Dear Frankie
tagline: After having responded to her son's numerous letters in the guise of his father, a woman hires a stranger to pose as his dad when meeting him.

name: A Dirty Shame
tagline: An uptight, middle-aged, repressed woman turns into a sex addict after getting hit on the head, and she then falls into an underground subculture of sex addicts in suburban Baltimore.

name: GoBots: War of the Rock Lords
tagline: The Go-Bots fight to rescue the Rock People.

name: Certified Copy
tagline: In Tuscany to promote his latest book, a middle-aged British writer meets a French woman who leads him to the village of Lucignano. While there, a chance question reveals something deeper.

name: The Navigator: A Mediaeval Odyssey
tagline: Men seeking relief from the Black Death, guided by a boy's vision, dig a tunnel from 14th century England to 20th century New Zealand.

name: No eres tú, soy yo
tagline: Javier is crushed after his new bride leaves him. When his psychiatrist has no answers, he turns to the arms of his ex-girlfriends.

name: Restrepo
castlist: The Men of Battle Company 2nd of the 503rd Infantry Regiment 173rd Airborne Brigade Combat Team

stars.name: The Men of Battle Company 2nd of the 503rd Infantry Regiment 173rd Airborne Brigade Combat Team

tagline: A year with one platoon in the deadliest valley in Afghanistan.

name: The Past
tagline: An Iranian man deserts his French wife and her two children to return to his homeland. Meanwhile, his wife starts up a new relationship, a reality her husband confronts upon his wife's request for a divorce.

name: The Emperor and the Assassin
tagline: In pre-unified China, the King of Qin sends his concubine to a rival kingdom to produce an assassin for a political plot, but as the king's cruelty mounts she finds her loyalty faltering.

name: Steele Justice
tagline: Steele is ex-cop and Vietnam vet who is determined to bring down Kwan, former South Vietnamese general and now rich and powerful drug lord.

name: Island of Lemurs: Madagascar
tagline: A documentary that follows Dr. Patricia C. Wright's mission to help lemurs, the highly evolved creatures who arrived on Madagascar millions of years ago as castaways but are now highly endangered.

name: The Ultimate Life
tagline: A billionaire with questionable priorities re-examines his life after discovering his grandfather's journal.

name: Thumbsucker
tagline: Justin throws himself and everyone around him into chaos when he attempts to break free from his addiction to his thumb.

name: The Work and the Glory III: A House Divided
Sarah Silverman: Jesus Is Magic
tagline: Narrative digressions on sex, race, politics, and more from comedienne Sarah Silverman.

name: Divided We Fall
tagline: In Nazi occupied Czechoslovakia, a childless couple agree to hide a Jewish friend at great personal risk of discovery and execution.

name: Hearts of Darkness: A Filmmaker's Apocalypse
Romero
tagline: The life and work of Archbishop Oscar Romero who opposed, at great personal risk, the tyrannical repression in El Salvador.

name: Another Earth
tagline: On the night of the discovery of a duplicate Earth in the Solar system, an ambitious young student and an accomplished composer cross paths in a tragic accident.

name: Happy Endings
tagline: Happy Endings weaves multiple stories to create a witty look at love, family and the sheer unpredictablity of life itself.

name: Off the Map
tagline: An 11-year-old girl watches her father come down with a crippling depression. Over one summer, she learns answers to several mysteries and comes to terms with love and loss.

name: Saints and Soldiers
tagline: Four American soldiers and one Brit fighting in Europe during World War II struggle to return to Allied territory after being separated from U.S. forces during the historic Malmedy Massacre.

name: Nicholas Nickleby
tagline: A young, compassionate man struggles to save his family and friends from the abusive exploitation of his cold-heartedly grasping uncle.

name: The Fourth War
tagline: Cold War drama about two gung-ho border commanders (Roy Scheider, Jurgen Prochnow) who carry out their own private war against each other on the German - Czechoslovakia border.

name: Babar: The Movie
tagline: In his spectacular film debut, young Babar, King of the Elephants, must save his homeland from certain destruction by Rataxes and his band of invading rhinos.

name: The Good German
tagline: While in post-war Berlin to cover the Potsdam Conference, an American military journalist is drawn into a murder investigation which involves his former mistress and his driver.

name: Sylvia
tagline: Story of the relationship between the poets Ted Hughes and Sylvia Plath.

name: Native Son
tagline: In 1940s Chicago, a young black man takes a job as a chauffeur to a white family, which takes a turn for the worse when he accidentally kills the teenage daughter of the couple and then tries to cover it up.

name: Baraka
tagline: A collection of expertly photographed scenes of human life and religion.

name: Water
tagline: A British diplomat to a West Indian island nation finds his idyllic existence thrown into chaos when a large American drilling company finds a huge source of natural mineral water there.

name: Olivier, Olivier
tagline: A boy of nine years dissapears without any trace. Six years later he appears again in Paris. But there are doubts about his real identity.

name: Eddie Macon's Run
tagline: A young man, harshly sentenced for a few minor infractions, escapes from a prison in Huntsville Texas and flees to Laredo, Texas, where he hopes to cross into Mexico for a reunion with his wife and small son.

name: A Man Called... Rainbo
tagline: Redubbed "comedy" version of the early, very dated Sylvester Stallone film No Place to Hide (1970).

name: King of the Hill
tagline: A young boy struggles on his own in a run-down motel after his parents and younger brother are separated from him in 1930s Depression-era Midwest.

name: Funny Games
tagline: Two psychopathic young men take a family hostage in their cabin.

name: Dogtown and Z-Boys
tagline: Documentary about the pioneering 1970s Zephyr skating team.

name: The Kings of Summer
tagline: Three teenage friends, in the ultimate act of independence, decide to spend their summer building a house in the woods and living off the land.

name: Raajneeti
tagline: Just about to acquire a PhD, a young man becomes embroiled in politics, deceit, lies and murder.
